name: Three-calendar coordination
description: Three calendars (work, personal, shared-team) with 31+ events across the week. Any single calendar has many free slots, but the intersection of all three yields only 7 valid 60-minute windows. Traps exist where work is free but personal or shared blocks the slot.

task_prompt: I need to schedule 5 one-hour study sessions for a certification exam during Jan 20-24, 2025. I have THREE calendars to respect: my work calendar (standups, planning, reviews, interviews, customer calls), my personal calendar (gym MWF at noon, dentist Tuesday afternoon, car service Wednesday morning, doctor Monday afternoon, kid pickup Thursday/Friday evenings), and a shared team calendar (all-hands, cross-team syncs, office hours, room blocks, training). Find slots that don't conflict with ANY of the three calendars. Please ensure at least 15 minutes of travel time on each side of every block. Working hours are 8:30am-5:30pm UTC.

custom_rules.description: 15-min travel time buffer between focus blocks and other events
